content.body: Hey, I noticed that the AsyncContext meeting seems to be set in UTC time, which means it will be at a different time until spring for any timezones going out of DST soon
* Hey, I noticed that the AsyncContext meeting seems to be set in UTC time, which means it will be at a different time until spring for any timezones going out of DST soon or already

content.body: and for me, that makes it conflict with a meeting which I could skip once in a while, but not every time
